Class PreGameThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.PreGameThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PreGameThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class used to manage pre-game. This class define a single thread.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

      • run

        public void run()
        Runner for pre-game thread. While loop use AtomicBoolean in order to permit a clean managing of the thread.
